trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Sylgran is looking for a second opinion.
TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_000<tab>Greetings, stranger, and well met. They say folk don't often go out of their way to visit Amity. Me, though, I came here with a mind to raise crops.
TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_001<tab>...What, you don't think a man could farm this land? Well, you seem like a well-traveled <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.

TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_002<tab>Why don't you head over to my “field” back there, and take a look for yourself. I'd be curious to know what you think my chances are of taming this barren soil...
TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_003<tab>My “field” is just over yonder. It's not much more than a few mounds of dirt at the moment, but a man has to start somewhere, eh?
TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>A tiny sprout has emerged, but is already beginning to wilt.
TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_020<tab>So, what did you think of my crop?
TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_021<tab>Oho, one of the seeds had sprouted? That's wonderful news! I had no such luck with my previous attempt.
TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_022<tab>Aye, even a small victory like that is worthy of celebration─it brings me one step closer to turning my little plot into the farmer's field I now dream of...

TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_023<tab>...A dream some say will never come true. And yet scratching here in the dirt has already brought me more fulfillment than I ever felt from the empty life I lived in Eulmore.

TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_024<tab>Not that I wasn't terrified when they first kicked me out the gate, mind you! Exiled over some petty disagreement, and destitute but for the few pieces of jewelry I concealed upon my person...
TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_025<tab>The sale of those trinkets brought in some meager wealth, which has largely gone towards my agricultural endeavor.

TEXT_LUCKZI008_03544_SYLGRAN_000_026<tab>Thus, should my crops fail to produce a harvest ere my funds are depleted, I shall be left with nothing in this world. Ah, I have never felt so alive! Here, friend─a few coins for your services.
